div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 859 Varna (anc. Odessus), Bulgaria, 1955 Burial: c. 275-265 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 200 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 71 tetradr. Philip III: 1 tetradr. Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 tetradr. Lysimachus: 4 tetradr. Seleucus I: 7 tetradr. Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Sumen coll. 85 as listed Gerasimov, BIAB 21 (1957), p. 325
